step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movement is good, but try to keep your wrists a bit more stable. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.
Great job on the shoulder movement! Keep your elbows and wrists a little steadier as you roll your shoulders back and down.
You're doing well with the shoulder rolls. Try to keep your wrists from moving too much and focus on the circular motion of your shoulders.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your wrists steady to improve your form.
